» 2014-08-13 21:49:39.694096285 -0600 MDT + "02 Jan 06 15:04 MST" = "13 Aug 14 21:49 MDT"
» 2014-08-13 21:49:39.694096285 -0600 MDT + "2006-01-02T15:04:05Z07:00" = "2014-08-13T21:49:39-06:00"
» 2014-08-13 21:49:39.694096285 -0600 MDT + "3:04PM" = "9:49PM"
» 2014-08-13 21:49:39.694096285 -0600 MDT + "Mon Jan 02 15:04:05 -0700 2006" = "Wed Aug 13 21:49:39 -0600 2014"
» 2014-08-13 21:49:39.694096285 -0600 MDT + "2006-01-_2" = "2014-08-13"
» "13 Aug 14 21:49 MDT" + "02 Jan 06 15:04 MST" = 2014-08-13 21:49:00 -0600 MDT
» "2014-08-13T21:49:39-06:00" + "2006-01-02T15:04:05Z07:00" = 2014-08-13 21:49:39 -0600 MDT
» "9:49PM" + "3:04PM" = 0000-01-01 21:49:00 +0000 UTC
» "Wed Aug 13 21:49:39 -0600 2014" + "Mon Jan 02 15:04:05 -0700 2006" = 2014-08-13 21:49:39 -0600 MDT
» "2014-08-13" + "2006-01-_2" = 2014-08-13 00:00:00 +0000 UTC
